## <span style="color:  #8C1721;"> Bio</span>

Julie Liu is a masters student studying Epidemiology at Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health. She is excited about her new academic journey and is fully prepared for the challenges and opportunities ahead. In her spare time, she enjoys swing dancing, playing social deception game(BOTC), listening to music, cooking, and many more.
